text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I'll prove Big Sis's equation at the Arima Kinen myself!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
We're here at the Arima Kinen, the final race of this year's Twinkle 
Series, and the star of the show is the Triple Crown champion, Narita 
Brian!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
We didn't get our wish to see her take on her sister, Biwa Hayahide, 
but she's ready to race for the two of them!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: And it's also Narita Brian's first mix-up with racers in the senior year!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Against these top-class veterans, can she win her fifth G1 race and 
become a Five Crown Champion?
Good, looks like you're focused even in a huge race like this.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I don't know how long I can keep steady though. My whole body's 
aching to run.

Hayahide's not here today, so that means all your opponents will be 
going after you.

Hayahide's not here today, so that means all your opponents will be 
going after you.

But that shouldn't be a problem. Show us another run that'll knock our 
socks off!

But that shouldn't be a problem. Show us another run that'll knock our 
socks off!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: You don't have to tell me twice. I'll take no prisoners.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Hehe… You made it after all, Narita Brian!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Only the toughest of the tough race in the Arima Kinen. But today 
I've only got my eyes on you!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
That's right, 'cause I think you're the strongest! So don't you dare 
back out of our race.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Sounds good to me. Give me everything you've got.
